<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create a user in the current customer account</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v2/users"}></MethodEndpoint>



Create a user for the current customer account.

## Request

The value defaults to the email.","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The description for the user.","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"api_roles"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The role names assigned to the user.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"201"} value={"201"}><div>

The created user.
